dt-option.name: columns.searchPanes.header
dt-option.summary: Set the title of the SearchPane

type.description: By setting the `-init columns.searchPanes.header` option to a string of your choice you can change the title shown in the Pane.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init columns.searchPanes.header` parameter is `undefined`. By default the pane will use the title of the column for its header.
dt-option.description: As standard, SearchPanes will set the headers of the pane based on the title of the corresponding column. This option customises that text in the pane's header.

example.title: Set the Header of the Pane to a custom string
